name: Nuts And Bolts (Alessio Landi)
description:
Nuts and Bolts is my submission for this fantastic jam!
The theme was "Collaborate with AI" and i choose to describe the unthinkable relationship between a gold squirrel and machines. The idea was that we are setting in a abbandoned world, where there are only robots. Our protagonist can and must go up them to survive and continue his journey. Where does he go? I don't know!

NEXT UPGRADES

Future updates or possible ideas:
- more and more and more levels;
- a story and many dialogues to investigate the world;
- more robots with different actions, some with low battery and others less resistant;
-hardware to pick up...

further ideas? C&C are welcome!

TOOLS

Engine: Unity
Pixel Art: Pyxel Edit
Sound: Fl Studio
Graphics: Affinity Designer


CREDITS
